Hi, I'm Wesley

I'm a web devoloper from Long Beach, Ca currently looking for work as a frontend, backend, or full stack web developer.

About Me

I'm Wesley W. Wilson and I find myself to be really happy when I’m learning. There is so much to learn in this world and I would really like to carve out a nice chunk of it. Web development/software engineering is a great career to continuously expand one’s knowledge and skills, this is one of the biggest reasons I code. Also, having the power to turn ideas into reality with my own hands feels great.

I’m focused on full stack web development and gaining more experience in this field. In the future, I am very interested in learning more about cyber security and blockchain programming. I’ll squeeze all the learning between karaoke nights, game nights, MMA fights, and connecting with nature; all of which are activities I enjoy that don’t involve a computer.
